product_name: Shimano SLX FD-M671 Down-Swing 10-Speed Triple Front Derailleur
long_description: Offering trail-ready ruggedness at a good value, the Shimano SLX FD-M671 Down-Swing 10-speed triple front derailleur supplies crisp and responsive shifts for your 3x10 drivetrain. Pivot design offers increased rigidity and responsiveness for crisp, clean shifts; well-designed cage offers tire clearance needed for your 29ers and full-suspension frames. Use with triple (3 chainring) cranksets and 10-speed chains (sold separately). Clamp fits 34.9mm seat tubes and comes with 31.8 and 28.6mm adapters. Angled adjustment screws provide easy access for a screwdriver. Shimano SLX FD-M671 Down-Swing 10-speed triple front derailleur is part of the Dyna-Sys group of components from Shimano and is compatible with other Dyna-Sys parts.
short_description: Offering trail-ready ruggedness at a good value, the Shimano SLX FD-M671 Down-Swing 10-speed triple front derailleur supplies crisp and responsive shifts for your 3x10 drivetrain.
